sys_remote_update_set.description: Forget about RIGHT CLICK and SAVE. Use only "CTRL+S" old functionality
sys_remote_update_set.name: SaveNow

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_4a8b51060f77d600184f4e9ce1050e25
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Get rid of saving via RIGHT click and select save. Now, have the same old functionality of CTRL+S to save. </description><global>true</global><name>savenow</name><script><![CDATA[/*
Add Event Listener on key down event for CTRL+S 
*/
document.addEventListener("keydown", function(event) {
	 
	//keycode 83 is for s
	//identify main key ==> metakey || ctrlkey
  if ((window.navigator.platform.toUpperCase().indexOf('MAC')>=0 ? event.metaKey : event.ctrlKey)  && event.keyCode == 83) {
	  
	  //Get the event value, "event.which" is for FF
	  event=event||window.event||event.which;
	  
	  //Prevent the dafault function called by CTRL+S
	  event.preventDefault();
    	
	  //Get full element of the form
	  var _form=g_form.getFormElement();
	  
	  //Get the sys_id value from the URL to check which UI Action needs to be called
	  var _sys=getParameterFromURL("sys_id").toString();
	  
	  //Based on value of sys_id, we will decide that which UI Action needs to be called, either for insert or Update
	  var _btnAction=_sys=="-1"?"sysverb_insert_and_stay":"sysverb_update_and_stay";
	  
	  //call the UI Action
	  gsftSubmit(null, _form, _btnAction);
	  
  }
}, false);]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Akash.Rajput</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-05 11:27:14</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4a8b51060f77d600184f4e9ce1050e25</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>savenow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SaveNow" source="0f1b99420f77d600184f4e9ce1050ea8">0f1b99420f77d600184f4e9ce1050ea8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="SaveNow">0f1b99420f77d600184f4e9ce1050ea8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_4a8b51060f77d600184f4e9ce1050e25</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Akash.Rajput</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-05 11:27:14</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_138c15c20f77d600184f4e9ce1050e8b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>get the value from URL for given parameter.
call getParameterFromURL(paramname) to fectch the value of parameter from URL</description><global>true</global><name>getParameterFromURL</name><script><![CDATA[function getParameterFromURL(_parm) { 
  var params = window.location.search.substr(1).split('&');
 
  for (var i = 0; i < params.length; i++) {
    var p=params[i].split('=');
	if (p[0] == _parm) {
	  return decodeURIComponent(p[1]);
	}
  }
  return false;
}]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Akash.Rajput</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-05 11:30:14</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>138c15c20f77d600184f4e9ce1050e8b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getParameterFromURL</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SaveNow" source="0f1b99420f77d600184f4e9ce1050ea8">0f1b99420f77d600184f4e9ce1050ea8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="SaveNow">0f1b99420f77d600184f4e9ce1050ea8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_138c15c20f77d600184f4e9ce1050e8b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Akash.Rajput</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-05 11:30:14</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
